text: (*Both the Assignment for the Subject to be Submitted in same response shoot) Internal Assignment-1 x x x Q.) - write answers for any two questions from below :- (A) List of characteristics of Goals :- %SC% A business owner's simplest goal is to be successful and make money. However this is not enough to make your business successful. You need to set well-defind goals that measure short-term, midterm and long-term sucess. you may also want to break goals into sales, marketing, development and company employee growth. most businesses use the smart model (SMART) for goal setting : SMART-Specific, measurable, Achievable Relevant and Timed.
